summary: This mod changes the four phases of the vampiric drain by multiplying it's power by three! All the phases will be three times stronger with this mod enabled. It also adds a new effect to the spell: drain stamina.
descriptionHtml:
The Vampiric Drain! It sounds pretty badass. Unfortunately it's a bit weak. But with this mod that problem will be solved! 

This mod changes the four phases of the vampiric drain by multiplying it's power by three! All the phases will be three times stronger with this mod enabled. It also adds a new effect to the spell: drain stamina. 

I hope you enjoy, like and thanks for downloading! :D 

NO DLC NEEDED

Steam version: [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=350679507]http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=350679507[/url]
author: Kevin2724
